main event: A 13-year-old boy sighted a round, smooth or oval-shaped object in San Mateo, California on December 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object was approximately 105 feet in diameter and hovered at an altitude of 100 yards to 1,600 yards.
The object was observed to move straight up, straight down, and side to side at speeds ranging from 100 to 2,000 or more mph.
The object had a glistening, flame-like appearance and made no noise.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
The witness thought the object was a 'flying saucer' and was unsure why he 'bothered about it'.
sighted object: round, smooth or oval-shaped object with a glistening, flame-like appearance
